snippet: Lawmakers voted early Friday to investigate former Finance Minister George Papaconstantinou over his handling of a list of wealthy Greeks with Swiss bank accounts.
abstract: Greek lawmakers vote to investigate former Finance Minister George Papaconstantinou over allegations that he tampered with list of wealthy Greeks with Swiss bank accounts, potential source of tax revenue that was never used by authorities, which stirred public outrage.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers voted early Friday to investigate former Finance Minister George Papaconstantinou over his handling of a list of wealthy Greeks with Swiss bank accounts.
